validation.domain-validation: Use the following URL format: example.com
validation.https-validation: Should be a valid https URL
validation.url-check-health: You entered the wrong network address or the block height on your endpoint is far behind
validation.ip-validation: Should be a valid IP address
validation.public-url-validation: Should not be a public endpoint of Ankr
validation.premium-url-validation: Should not be a premium endpoint of Ankr
validation.duplicate-url-validation: This endpoint has already been added

error.access-token-error: Unable to obtain access token from multirpc-sdk

chains.title: Choose Your Network
chains.archive-tooltip-text: Archived Mode makes it possible to reference a complete history of data kept on full nodes stretching back to the genesis block. This is necessary to complete queries to a distant historical state, such as a past account balance at block #4,000,000. It is especially useful for services like block explorers, wallet vendors, and chain analytics.

meta.title: {name} Public RPC | Ankr Protocol
meta.description: Experience unrestricted access to a decentralized {name} RPC for developers and DeFi users.

header.public-endpoints-tip: The Public RPC is our free and open endpoint that powers many different developer applications!
header.tooltipText:
Reach a Premium Endpoint to ensure a faster dedicated experience that only serves
traffic for your project.

nodes-table.tooltip-text: Height, weight and availability of nodes depends on location.

plan.more-questions: Have more questions? Let's hear them!

header.title: Ship fast, scale and save with Premium features.
header.sub-title: Connect to the network of your choice and build with our fast, reliable, and decentralized infrastructure. Supercharge your dApp with premium features with an annual Premium Plan.
header.sub-title2: Limited-time, developer-first pricing that crushes the competition

purchase-block.title: Purchase an Annual Premium Plan for {value, number, ::compact-short} ANKR.
purchase-block.sub-title: Developer-first pricing to scale your project fast. Use ANKR to pay for premium access to leading Web3 infrastructure.

features-block.feature2: More Requests To Power Your Project
features-block.feature6: Dedicated Endpoints For All Supported Chains
features-block.feature-full1: Provide a constant stream of blockchain data to your application so your applications and platforms can be updated in real-time.
features-block.feature-full2: Scale your application to handle any amount of blockchain requests. Our premium plan serves dApps and platforms of all sizes.
features-block.feature-full3: See all on-chain activity and stay up to date on network activity with our analytics tools.
features-block.feature-full4: Our infrastructure is ready to serve your needs with lightning-fast and reliable returns no matter your location. Ankr removes the need for developers to run their own blockchain nodes, freeing up more time and money to focus on building!
features-block.feature-full5: Ankr Protocol will always prioritize our Premium users to ensure they receive every resource they need to develop and connect with chains.
features-block.feature-full6: Access to dedicated endpoints ensures that your project always has node resources to power it at the highest level of performance.  Build easier on any network with multi-chain infrastructure ready to handle any application’s needs.

table.archive-data-info: Developers can access and query on-chain information stretching all the way back to the genesis block.
table.advanced-api-info: Our Advanced API enables simultaneous data querying across multiple chains, allowing developers to build faster with fewer requests.
table.high-traffic-info: During peak RPC traffic times, public users are rate-limited to prioritize Premium users with node resources.
table.rate-limit-info: Rate limits cap the amount of request traffic on the public RPC to keep node resources balanced and available to all.
table.row4-col2: Soft limit of 1M requests per day
table.global-coverage: Global node coverage for low  latency

agreement.text: I understand that my wallet app will deposit these tokens and I will incur a gas fee. The deposit is non-refundable. Ankr cannot assist with lost passwords for wallet apps.

validation.checkbox: Please, check this box to proceed

deposit-success.title: Deposited Successfully
deposit-success.subtitle: We need your email so you can receive updates.

pro.title: Congratulations!
pro.subtitle: You have access to all premium features

endpoint.title: My endpoints
endpoint.tooltip-text: You have reached the maximum number of endpoints ({limit}).
endpoint.chain-tooltip-text: You don't have an access to add {chainId} endpoint.

delete-dialog.info: Are you sure you’d like to remove {name} endpoint?

security.title: Security
security.tooltip-text: Ensure the integrity of your requests by adding an extra layer of security with the domain (url referer) and IP address allowlist.

private-endpoints.title: Premium Endpoint{plural}
private-endpoints.tooltip: Use Premium Endpoint as your main API endpoint for development. Do not use "My Endpoints" directly.

user-endpoints.title: My Endpoints
user-endpoints.tooltip: Will be prioritized ahead of Premium Nodes when serving traffic.

add-endpoint.description: You can import your personal endpoint, which will be used to process requests that are sent to your exclusive ANKR endpoint. In case of an error, the request will be processed by our nodes for premium users. Please enter a valid https endpoint address and the system will check it.

premium.text: Your premium subscription is active till {date, time, ::dMMMy}.
premium.additional: Then you'll have to Top Up balance to continue use premium features.

served.text: Enough for {quantifier}{value} {period}{plural}, based on your current usage

unserved.text: Service stoped due to zero balance, please top up

step-content.0: I understand my wallet will make a non-refundable deposit that includes a gas fee. Ankr cannot provide assistance if I lose access to my wallet and the associated Premium account
step-content.1: Click Metamask extension and provide us your public encryption key.
step-content.2: Click Metamask extension and allow us to spend your ANKR.
step-content.3: Click Metamask extension and confirm deposit.
step-content.4: Thank you! Operation will take 2-4 minutes.
step-content.5: Finally, click Metamask extension and decrypt the message.

step-notice.1: To enable Ankr to securely enable your deposit.
step-notice.2: So we could take your deposit.
step-notice.3: Operation will take a while (2-4 min).
step-notice.4: Don’t worry, Ethereum Network needs to calculate 12 blocks. 10-20 seconds each.
step-notice.5: The last step in your sign in process.

step-content.0: I understand my wallet will make a deposit that includes a gas fee. Ankr cannot provide assistance if I lose access to my wallet and the associated account
step-content.1: Click Metamask extension and provide us your public encryption key.
step-content.2: Click Metamask extension and allow us to use your {amount} ANKR.
step-content.3: Click Metamask extension and confirm deposit.
step-content.4: Thank you! Operation will take 2-4 minutes.
step-content.5: Finally, click Metamask extension and decrypt the message.

step-notice.1: To enable Ankr to securely top up your balance.
step-notice.2: So we could top up your balance.
step-notice.3: Operation will take a while (2-4 min).
step-notice.4: Don’t worry, Ethereum Network needs to calculate 12 blocks. 10-20 seconds each.
step-notice.5: The last step in your sign in process.

step-content.0: I understand my wallet will make a deposit that includes a gas fee. Ankr cannot provide assistance if I lose access to my wallet and the associated account
step-content.1: How much would you like to withdraw?
step-content.2: Operation could take up to 15 minutes.
step-content.3: Thank you! Transaction is on the way.

step-notice.2: Don’t worry, our system finalizing calculation.
step-notice.3: After Ethereum network validation you will see updated balance of your wallet.
